definitions.definition: Of a geologic period within the Paleozoic era ; comprises the Llandovery , Wenlock , Ludlow and Pridoli epochs from about 439 to 409 million years ago.
Of or related to the Silures , a pre-Roman British tribe.

main_definition: ( geology ) Of a geologic period within the Paleozoic era ; comprises the Llandovery , Wenlock , Ludlow and Pridoli epochs from about 439 to 409 million years ago.
secondary_definitions: ( archaeology ) Of or related to the Silures , a pre-Roman British tribe.
